title: SDG Learning Program for Collaborative Mathematics Terminology and Concept Acquisition

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Collaborative activities centered on mathematical terms and concepts in a single-display groupware (SDG) environment using smartphone apps. Groups of 4–6 use tablet/smartphone mirroring systems.

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively explain over 50 intermediate-level mathematical terms in context with peers in an SDG (Sustainable Development Goals) environment.
Learners can visually model over 10 mathematical concepts (e.g., functions, equations, geometric properties) through group collaboration.
Learners can systematically document mathematical problem-solving processes collaboratively with peers via project-based assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
